name: ListCustomFieldOptions
description:
List options for a given custom accounting field.

This tool retrieves available options for a specified custom accounting field, allowing users to view or select from predefined choices.

parameters.name: custom_field_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the custom accounting field to retrieve options for.

parameters.name: filter_by_external_id
parameters.description: Filter the options by the external/remote ID of custom accounting fields in the ERP system. Useful for narrowing down options to specific fields associated with a given external ID.

value_schema.description: Filter by Remote/external ID of custom accounting field options in ERP system.

parameters.name: filter_by_field_option_code
parameters.description: Specify the code to filter custom accounting field options.

value_schema.description: Filter by code of custom accounting field options.

parameters.name: pagination_start_id
parameters.description: The ID of the last entity from the previous page to retrieve the next page of results.

value_schema.description: The ID of the last entity of the previous page, used for pagination to get the next page.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: The number of results to return per page, between 2 and 100. Defaults to 20 if not specified.

value_schema.description: The number of results to be returned in each page. The value must be between 2 and 100. If not specified, the default value 20 will be used.

parameters.name: include_active_options
parameters.description: Include only active options if true; otherwise, include all.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the ramp API.

parameters.name: remote_id
parameters.description: Filter by Remote/external ID of custom accounting field options in ERP system.

value_schema.description: Filter by Remote/external ID of custom accounting field options in ERP system.

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: Filter by code of custom accounting field options.

value_schema.description: Filter by code of custom accounting field options.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The ID of the last entity of the previous page, used for pagination to get the next page.

value_schema.description: The ID of the last entity of the previous page, used for pagination to get the next page.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of results to be returned in each page. The value must be between 2 and 100. If not specified, the default value 20 will be used.

value_schema.description: The number of results to be returned in each page. The value must be between 2 and 100. If not specified, the default value 20 will be used.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
